span.p: We will be posting all of our notices and other relevant information about the COVID-19 virus here.
To help your child understand COVID-19:

li.a: Talking to Children About COVID-19 (Coronavirus): A Parent Resource
li.span: from the National Association of School Psychologists and the National Association of School Nurses

ul.li: Healthline has published “How to Talk to Your Kids About the Coronavirus”
Psychology Today has published “How to Talk to Your Anxious Child About the Coronavirus”

Thank you,
